job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are seeking a Data Engineer to join our Data & AI team. At Delta-N, you will have the opportunity to work in a versatile team with Data Scientists, Data Analysts, Software Engineers, and DevOps consultants. As a Data Engineer, you play a crucial connecting role within our team. You will contribute to the development of modern, scalable, and maintainable data infrastructures that help our clients achieve their data-driven objectives. With your strong programming skills in Python (PySpark), SQL, and experience with tools like Azure Databricks, you will set the standard for creating future-proof data platforms and ensure a solid, reliable foundation for delivering data products.

   As a Data Engineer, your tasks will include:
     * Modeling and structuring data.
     * Developing scalable and maintainable data pipelines that make data from REST APIs and SQL databases available in data warehouses, enabling data products.
     * Implementing data warehousing and data lakes, including automated data migrations.
     * Setting up cloud infrastructure based on IaC (infrastructure as code, for example, in Bicep or Terraform).
     * Analyzing existing data platforms and proposing structural improvements based on your findings.
     * Staying up-to-date and sharing knowledge about the latest trends and technologies in data and AI.
job_details.full_text:
Data Engineer

We are seeking a Data Engineer to join our Data & AI team. At Delta-N, you will have the opportunity to work in a versatile team with Data Scientists, Data Analysts, Software Engineers, and DevOps consultants. As a Data Engineer, you play a crucial connecting role within our team. You will contribute to the development of modern, scalable, and maintainable data infrastructures that help our clients achieve their data-driven objectives. With your strong programming skills in Python (PySpark), SQL, and experience with tools like Azure Databricks, you will set the standard for creating future-proof data platforms and ensure a solid, reliable foundation for delivering data products.

   As a Data Engineer, your tasks will include:
     * Modeling and structuring data.
     * Developing scalable and maintainable data pipelines that make data from REST APIs and SQL databases available in data warehouses, enabling data products.
     * Implementing data warehousing and data lakes, including automated data migrations.
     * Setting up cloud infrastructure based on IaC (infrastructure as code, for example, in Bicep or Terraform).
     * Analyzing existing data platforms and proposing structural improvements based on your findings.
     * Staying up-to-date and sharing knowledge about the latest trends and technologies in data and AI.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional data engineering tasks such as data pipelines, data warehousing, and infrastructure setup using tools like Python, SQL, and Azure Databricks. While it mentions 'Data & AI team' and 'data-driven objectives', it lacks specific details about generative AI, LLMs, or predictive modeling that would align it with an ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profile. The primary focus is on building data infrastructure rather than developing or deploying AI models.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves developing scalable and maintainable data pipelines, implementing data warehousing and data lakes, and making data available from various sources.
job_tasks.phrase: Developing scalable and maintainable data pipelines that make data from REST APIs and SQL databases available in data warehouses, enabling data products.

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions implementing data warehousing and data lakes, which are core data engineering responsibilities.
job_tasks.phrase: Implementing data warehousing and data lakes, including automated data migrations.

job_tasks.justification: Setting up cloud infrastructure using Infrastructure as Code is a key aspect of modern data engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: Setting up cloud infrastructure based on IaC (infrastructure as code, for example, in Bicep or Terraform).

job_tasks.justification: Analyzing existing platforms and proposing improvements is part of maintaining and optimizing data infrastructure.
job_tasks.phrase: Analyzing existing data platforms and proposing structural improvements based on your findings.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Modeling and structuring data' directly relates to the process of organizing and preparing data for analysis or storage, which is a component of modeling.
The role requires strong programming skills in Python and SQL, which are foundational for software development tasks within data engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: strong programming skills in Python (PySpark), SQL

job_tasks.justification: The mention of DevOps consultants and setting up cloud infrastructure using IaC points towards operational aspects of managing data platforms.
job_tasks.phrase: DevOps consultants. Setting up cloud infrastructure based on IaC

job_tasks.justification: The role aims to help clients achieve their data-driven objectives, indicating a need to understand business goals related to data.
job_tasks.phrase: help our clients achieve their data-driven objectives

soft_skills.phrase: Staying up-to-date and sharing knowledge about the latest trends and technologies in data and AI.
work in a versatile team with Data Scientists, Data Analysts, Software Engineers, and DevOps consultants.

technologies.phrase: IaC (infrastructure as code, for example, in Bicep or Terraform)
